languages.text: "Я возношу молитвы за души невинных. И за то, чтоб дущи виновных не обрели покоя".
"I pray for the souls of the innocent. And that the souls of the guilty may not find peace."
languages.original_text: "Я возношу молитвы за души невинных. И за то, чтоб дущи виновных не обрели покоя".

traits.locale_text: "I pray for the souls of the innocent. And that the souls of the guilty may not find peace."
"I pray for the souls of the innocent. And that the souls of the guilty may not find peace."
"I pray for the souls of the innocent. And that the souls of the guilty may not find peace."
"I pray for the souls of the innocent. And that the souls of the guilty may not find peace."

languages.text: “我为无辜者的灵魂祈祷，也希望有罪之人的灵魂永远不得安宁。”
languages.original_text: "I pray for the souls of the innocent. And that the souls of the guilty may not find peace."

traits.locale_text: “我为无辜者的灵魂祈祷，也希望有罪之人的灵魂永远不得安宁。”

languages.text: « Je prie pour les âmes des innocents. Et pour que les hérétiques ne trouvent jamais le repos. »
languages.original_text: "I pray for the souls of the innocent. And that the souls of the guilty may not find peace."

traits.locale_text: « Je prie pour les âmes des innocents. Et pour que les hérétiques ne trouvent jamais le repos. »

languages.text: "Ich bete für die Seelen der Unschuldigen. Und dafür, dass die Seelen der Schuldigen keinen Frieden finden."
languages.original_text: "I pray for the souls of the innocent. And that the souls of the guilty may not find peace."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bete für die Seelen der Unschuldigen. Und dafür, dass die Seelen der Schuldigen keinen Frieden finden."

languages.text: 「私は無垢な魂のために祈ろう。罪ある魂には平穏が訪れぬように祈ろう」
languages.original_text: "I pray for the souls of the innocent. And that the souls of the guilty may not find peace."

traits.locale_text: 「私は無垢な魂のために祈ろう。罪ある魂には平穏が訪れぬように祈ろう」

languages.text: «Rezo por las almas de los inocentes. Y por que las almas de los culpables nunca descansen».
languages.original_text: "I pray for the souls of the innocent. And that the souls of the guilty may not find peace."

traits.locale_text: «Rezo por las almas de los inocentes. Y por que las almas de los culpables nunca descansen».

languages.original_text: "I pray for the souls of the innocent. And that the souls of the guilty may not find peace."

languages.text: "Masumların ruhlarına dua okurum. Suçluların ruhlarıysa huzura ermesin."
languages.original_text: "I pray for the souls of the innocent. And that the souls of the guilty may not find peace."

traits.locale_text: "Masumların ruhlarına dua okurum. Suçluların ruhlarıysa huzura ermesin."
